long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
To quickly access and filter your browser tab groups using a keyboard shortcut. With this extension, you can efficiently manage and find your tabs, helping you to stay organized and more productive.

Quick access: With just one click, you can easily view and manage all of the tabs you have open.

Tab grouping: Use the tab grouping feature to keep all related tabs together for easier viewing and management.

Whether you're a power user with a tab addiction or just looking to manage your tabs better, this plugin is worth a try!

how to use :

Install the extension
Use the cmd / alt + shift +K shortcut to access your browser tab groups
Search or filter for the tabs you want to find
Click on a tab to automatically switch to it

Input "#" to view tabs as groups
